description: This Java class defines a Spring Boot REST controller with endpoints for testing JWT authentication and role-based access control (RBAC). It includes three endpoints: public, user, and admin, each protected by different security annotations.

classes.name: DemoSecureController
classes.description: A REST controller for verifying JWT authentication and role-based access permissions within the application.

methods.name: publicEndpoint
methods.description: Returns a simple string indicating public access; accessible by anyone.

methods.name: userEndpoint
methods.description: Returns a string indicating user access; requires the user to have 'USER' or 'ADMIN' role.

methods.name: adminEndpoint
methods.description: Returns a string indicating admin access; requires the 'ADMIN' role.
